messages.content: I am writing to seek your vote to continue as your Member of Parliament. It has been a privilege to serve the people of Leyton and Wanstead. It has been an honour to campaign with residents and community groups to make a real difference.
I hope you will consider using your vote on the Thursday 12 December 2019 to allow me to continue being your strong voice in Westminster and to be a lifeline to local people in need.

We need a government which will make the key decisions in the next two years on tackling climate change and will strengthen rights at work which have been eroded by the Conservatives and their previous coalition partners, the Liberal Democrats. We cannot afford another five years of uncertainty, division and despair. The only real answer is a vote for me.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: After three years of Brexit, this is the only way to move forward.
Police and local services immediately need our backing.
Protect bed numbers and services at the new Whipps Cross.
Labour's Green Transformation will cut carbon emissions and create green jobs.
Continue to oppose London City Airport expansion & defend local services.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Conservatives and their previous coalition partners, the Liberal Democrats.

community.content: Continue to oppose London City Airport expansion & defend local services.
